text.text_translated: Chloe arrived home from school and made herself a cup of coffee, which she took up to her bedroom. She had some homework to do, but that could wait for later. She wanted to enjoy the quiet hour before her parents arrived home. After they arrived, the house would fill up with the evening sounds of chatter, television, or her dad listening to his beloved jazz while he cooked dinner. She also liked this time of day because she could play with her pet rats.
